snippet.title: Escape Simulator 2 - Demo & Gameplay Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative
snippet.description:
Learn more about Escape Simulator 2: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2879840/Escape_Simulator_2/

We're excited to reveal Escape Simulator 2, the sequel to the best-selling escape room game! For the first time, players can see a glimpse of the game in action, exploring new rooms, solving intricate puzzles, and experiencing fresh gameplay mechanics. From Dracula’s castle to a starship lost in deep space and a pirate ship on stormy seas, each environment is filled with hidden secrets and interactive challenges. To mark the occasion, we're launching a playable demo on Steam, giving players a chance to dive in and experience the next evolution of Escape Simulator firsthand.

Follow news and updates on The Triple-i Initiative:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/triple-i-initiative 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/iii_initiative 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@iii_initiative 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iii_initiative 
Bilibili: https://space.bilibili.com/3546638813497663
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/iii_initiative 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@the.iii_initiative 

What is the triple-i initiative?

The Triple-i Initiative is a bunch of studios banding together to share exciting news to our players, in a short show packed with back-to-back trailers. That’s it - no extra fluff, no ads, no host, just games. We’re talking world premieres, exclusive gameplay, launch dates, demo drops and more!

You can learn more over on https://iii-initiative.com
